name: Fierce Eau De Cologne - 100ml
description:
Fierce Eau De Cologne - An Iconic Masculine Fragrance

Experience the powerful allure of Fierce Cologne, a legendary scent that has defined masculine fragrance for over two decades. This 100ml eau de cologne captures the essence of confidence and raw magnetism with its perfect blend of woody aromatic notes.

About Fierce Cologne

First introduced in 2002, Fierce quickly established itself as the signature scent for the confident modern man. Its bold character and distinctive profile have made it one of the best-selling colognes of all time, recognized worldwide for its unmistakable presence. The iconic woody aromatic fragrance continues to dominate as a top men's cologne two decades after its launch. âœ¨

Size Gender Product Type Concentration Brand
100ml Men Cologne Eau de Cologne Fierce

Fierce Cologne Fragrance Notes

Top Notes Orange, Fir, Cardamom, Lemon
Heart Notes Rosemary, Jasmine, Lily-of-the-Valley, Rose
Base Notes Musk, Vetiver, Oakmoss, Brazilian Rosewood

Key Features of Fierce Eau De Cologne

  • ðŸ”¥ Intense, long-lasting woody aromatic scent
  • ðŸ’Ž Distinctive blend of citrus, herbs, and musk
  • ðŸŒ¿ Perfect for day-to-night wear
  • ðŸ’« Iconic status in the designer fragrance world
  • âœ¨ Magnetic appeal that draws compliments

The legacy of Fierce Cologne began with its revolutionary approach to men's fragrances, breaking away from traditional scents to create something truly distinctive. Its bold character made it an instant classic, becoming the olfactory embodiment of confidence and masculinity for a generation of men. Even today, it remains a benchmark against which other premium fragrances are measured.

Frequently Asked Question

How long does Fierce Eau De Cologne last on skin?

Fierce Cologne is known for its impressive longevity, typically lasting 6-8 hours on most skin types. The woody base notes create a foundation that allows the fragrance to develop throughout the day, while the musk components help it cling to skin for extended wear. For maximum longevity, apply to pulse points on moisturized skin. ðŸŒ¸
